data.news_body: KPI Green Energy Limited has informed the exchange regarding receipt of Letter of Award from Aditya Birla Renewables Limited for 64 MWac / 96 MWp Solar Balance of Plant. The detailed disclosure is attached herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: KPI Green Energy Limited has informed the exchange that CRISIL Ratings Limited has assigned a Provisional CRISIL AA+ (CE) / Stable rating to the proposed Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) - GREEN BONDS to be issued by KPI Green Energy Limited aggregating up to INR 700 Crores. Disclosure is attached herewith.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: KPI Green Energy Limited informed the BSE that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on today i.e. August 5 2025 declared First Interim Dividend at 4% i.e. Rs. 0.20/- per equity share having face value of Rs. 5/- each on the equity shares of the Company for the Financial Year 2025-26. Disclosure is attached herewith.
